Zend_Gdata_Geo

Description
Description | Vars (details) | Methods (details) Constants

Service class for interacting with the services which use the GeoRSS + GML extensions.

  • copyright: Copyright (c) 2005-2008 Zend Technologies USA Inc. (http://www.zend.com)
  • link: http://georss.org/
  • link: http://code.google.com/apis/picasaweb/reference.html#georss_reference
  • link: http://www.opengis.net/gml/
  • license: New BSD License
